name: Serviced Apartment in 30C Ha Hoi
address: 30C X m H  H i, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Serviced Apartment in 30C Ha Hoi is situated in Hanoi, 400 metres from Quan Su Temple. Trang Tien Plaza is 700 metres away. Free private parking is available on site.

There is also a kitchenette, fitted with a fridge. Serviced Apartment in 30C Ha Hoi features free WiFi . Towels are provided.

St. Joseph Cathedral is 800 metres from Serviced Apartment in 30C Ha Hoi, while Ba Dinh Square is 900 metres from the property. The nearest airport is Noi Bai International Airport, 22 km from the property.
